connector.description: Send data to Google Sheets and update/append values on a spreadsheet.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.spreads.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.spreadsheetId
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.spreads.description: The Spreadsheet ID to be used as identifier

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientI.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientId
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientI.description: Client ID of the sheets application

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientS.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientSecret
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.clientS.description: Client Secret of the sheets application

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.accessT.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.accessToken
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.accessT.description: OAuth 2 access token for google sheets application. This typically expires after an hour so refreshToken is recommended for long term usage.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.refresh.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.refreshToken
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.refresh.description: OAuth 2 refresh token for google sheets application. Using this, the Google Calendar component can obtain a new accessToken whenever the current one expires - a necessity if the application is long-lived.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.operati.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.operation
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.operati.description: Operation to execute (update or append) Example: append

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.range.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.range
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.range.description: The cell range of rows and columns to write data to. Example: A1:B3

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.majorDi.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.majorDimension
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.majorDi.description: Specifies the major dimension that the given values should use (ROWS or COLUMNS). Example: ROWS

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.columnN.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.columnNames
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.columnN.description: Optional custom column names that map to cell coordinates based on their position.

camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.valueIn.name: camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.valueInputOption
camel.kamelet.google-sheets-sink.valueIn.description: Controls how the entered values should be be interpreted when adding them. Example: USER_ENTERED
